import matplotlib import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import pandas as pd import numpy as np import scipy import pickle import os
import snips as snp
# Boilerplate settings matplotlib.interactive(True) snp.prettyplot(matplotlib) plt.close("all") path = snp.getboxroot() + "$PATH$" os.chdir(path)
$END$
